column2:
"Regarding the virtual simulator training
we had last time,this country... I meant
the client has indicated their interest."

"A request for a follow-up investigation
was received.
However, honestly I have enough of it."

"So I have decided to monitor you from
outside during the next special training."

"Regarding the quality of the special
training, maybe I can obtain such info
observing externally. We shall try."

"I'll leave it to you to choose which
special training to accept.
I'll be counting on you."

"例の仮想シミュレータ訓練について
報告したら本国……失礼
クライアントが興味を示してね。"

"追加で調査の依頼が来ているのよ。
けれど、私は正直もうコリゴリだわ。"

"だから、今度は外から貴方が
訓練するのをじっくりモニタリング
させてもらうことにするわ。"

"もしかしたら、訓練の性質上
外からは、情報が手に入らないかも
しれないけど、物は試しよ。"

"どの訓練を受けるかはお任せするわ。
よろしくお願いね。"
